Articles.Content:
Hello! Welcome to SkyCoach! (Yes, Airbus but BIGGER!)

I make modded craft for KSP. So enjoy!

SkyCoach T-42 Interceptor:

Price:

$26,000,000.

Class:

Army Interceptor/Scout.

Pictures:

http://imgur.com/a/8Z5gl

This is amazing. It can take off before the 09 on the runway and climb at 40 degrees. If it flames out, the SAS can right it as low as 100m. Try it for yourself. Note: Requires KAS to work:

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/0-18-2-kas-kerbal-attachment-system-v0-1/
